body:
- [**area/rest-api**][**3.x**][**area/documentation**] List artifact types duplicated [#5216](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/5216)
- [**type/bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**][**area/compatibility**][**area/rest-api**][**area/storage**][**3.x**] Rest API /search/versions?contentId=XX throws exception [#5210](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/5210)
- [**type/bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**][**area/serdes**][**3.x**] DefaultSchemaResolver resolve schema by content doesn't dereference when auto-register = false, thus failing to find registered schema [#5208](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/5208)
- [**type/bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**][**area/serdes**][**3.x**] DefaultSchemaResolver resolve schema by content second attempt with canonical=false fails [#5206](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/5206)
- [**type/bug**][**priority/high**][**area/ui**][**3.x**] Failed to start apicurio-registry-ui:3.0.0.M4 [#5170](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/5170)
- [**type/bug**][**area/storage**] The group already exists when creating a new artifact multiple repeatably. [#4936](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/4936)
- [**type/bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**][**area/rest-api**][**area/storage**][**3.x**] REST API /search/versions query parameter order matters [#4930](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/4930)
- [**area/rest-api**] CORS error when logging with Microsoft [#4853](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/4853)
- [**component/registry**][**3.x**] Update the Confluent export utility for v3 [#4779](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/4779)
- [**type/enhancement**][**area/storage**][**3.x**] Apicurio registry sql connections number [#4757](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/4757)
- [**type/bug**][**area/storage**] Timeout trying to lock table when processing records in multiple threads [#4351](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/4351)
- [**type/enhancement**][**area/auth**] Add ability to configure post_logout_redirect_uri  [#3400](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3400)
